meanings.definition: The quality or state of being immortal.
meanings.sent1: Legends often speak of the immortalities of ancient gods.
meanings.sent2: The belief in immortalities has been a common theme in many cultures.
meanings.sent3: The idea of immortalities in fairy tales adds a magical touch to the stories.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fiction, vampires symbolize the immortalities that humans desire.
meanings.sent5: The concept of immortalities in myths captures our imagination and wonder.

meanings.sent1: The quest for eternal youth is a pursuit of immortalities.
meanings.sent2: Some cultures believe in an afterlife as a form of immortalities.
meanings.sent3: In a video game, collecting power-ups can give the player immortalities.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky seem to hold the secret of immortalities.
meanings.sent5: The idea of immortalities in science fiction explores the boundaries of time and space.
